bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For taxation years subsequent to the 2015 taxation year, the actual value of designated port land for a taxation year is the actual value determined by the following formula:

oasis:entry.oasis:line: actual value = previous actual value x (1 + inflation adjustment)
the actual value of the designated port land as set out in the assessment roll for the previous taxation year;
the percentage change in the consumer price index for July of the year in which the assessment roll is completed from July of the previous year.

change.changenote: Section 4 (2) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 280/2016, effective December 5, 2016.
